sentence: The 2018 race for governor in Georgia ended in a bitter dispute between Brian Kemp, a Republican who was serving as secretary of state at the time, and Stacey Abrams, the Democratic challenger who accused the state of voter suppression.
title: Georgia's 2018 Rematch, in a Courtroom

sentence: The 2018 race for governor in Georgia ended in a bitter dispute between Brian Kemp, a Republican who was serving as secretary of state at the time, and Stacey Abrams, the Democratic challenger who accused the state of voter suppression.
title: Georgia's 2018 Rematch, in a Courtroom

sentence: The hold-up is because of a new law that Georgia's GOP-controlled General Assembly passed last year that was designed to put current Governor Brian Kemp at an early fundraising advantage, but because of lawsuits from Abrams and Kemp's Republican primary challengers, hasn't quite worked out that way.
author: Keith Reed
title: Stacey Abrams Lands $1M Donation From George Soros
